metadata.Title: CVE-2015-6730 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in thumb.php in MediaWiki before 1.23.10, 1.24.x before 1.24.3, and 1.25.x before 1.25.2 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the f parameter, which is not properly handled in an error page, related to "ForeignAPI images."

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-6730` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1:1.27.4-1
mediawiki-classes - 1:1.27.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.27.4-1').
